overview:
David Bangs joins Drobo from HP, where he led the HP StorageWorks sales organization, focused on emerging growth accounts in the mid-market.

David was VP of worldwide sales at LeftHand Networks, an innovator and leader in the iSCSI SAN market, where he built and led the sales organization from initial shipments to more than 5,000 customer wins and ultimately the company’s acquisition by HP in November, 2008. Prior to LeftHand Networks, David served in sales leadership roles at Quantum, Control Data, and Toshiba. David earned his BA (Honors) in Business from South Bank University, London, England.
